metadata.title: CVE-2022-48745 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Use del_timer_sync in fw reset flow of halting pollSubstitute del_timer() with del_timer_sync() in fw reset pollingdeactivation flow, in order to prevent a race condition which occurswhen del_timer() is called and timer is deactivated while anotherprocess is handling the timer interrupt. A situation that led tothe following call trace:	RIP: 0010:run_timer_softirq+0x137/0x420	<IRQ>	recalibrate_cpu_khz+0x10/0x10	ktime_get+0x3e/0xa0	? sched_clock_cpu+0xb/0xc0	__do_softirq+0xf5/0x2ea	irq_exit_rcu+0xc1/0xf0	sysvec_apic_timer_interrupt+0x9e/0xc0	asm_sysvec_apic_timer_interrupt+0x12/0x20	</IRQ>
